trans-unit.source: Specifies a set of standard access rights that correspond to operations common to most types of securable objects.
trans-unit.target: 指定標準存取權集合以對應至通用於大部分安全物件型別的作業。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Messaging.StandardAccessRights> class provides access rights for common operations, such as deleting, reading, and writing.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.StandardAccessRights>類別會提供一般作業，例如刪除、 讀取和寫入存取權限。

trans-unit.source: The precise meaning of each member is specific to the object type to which it is applied.
trans-unit.target: 每個成員的精確的意義會因要套用的物件類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.StandardAccessRights> is one of two enumerations to which the <xref:System.Messaging.GenericAccessRights> enumeration maps extensive read, write, or execute abilities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.StandardAccessRights> 是兩個要列舉的其中一個<xref:System.Messaging.GenericAccessRights>廣泛的列舉型別對應的讀取、 寫入或執行的能力。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Messaging.StandardAccessRights> enables you to specify rights common to most objects, for example, deleting the object or reading a security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Messaging.StandardAccessRights> 可讓您指定的權限一般大部分的物件，例如，刪除物件，或讀取的安全性描述元。

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Messaging.StandardAccessRights> and <xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights> provide a member for deleting a queue.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.Messaging.StandardAccessRights>和<xref:System.Messaging.MessageQueueAccessRights>提供成員刪除佇列。

trans-unit.source: The needs of the application define which set of flags you use.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式需求，定義您所使用的旗標的設定。

trans-unit.source: Combines <see langword="Delete" />, <see langword="ReadSecurity" />, <see langword="WriteSecurity" />, <see langword="ModifyOwner" />, and <see langword="Synchronize" /> access.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <see langword="Delete" />、<see langword="ReadSecurity" />、<see langword="WriteSecurity" />、<see langword="ModifyOwner" /> 和 <see langword="Synchronize" /> 存取權。

trans-unit.source: The right to delete the object.
trans-unit.target: 刪除物件的權限。

trans-unit.source: The right to read the information in the object's security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 讀取物件安全性描述元中資訊的權限。

trans-unit.source: On Windows 2000 and Windows NT, the security descriptor contains the security information for a securable object.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows 2000 和 Windows NT 上，安全性描述元包含安全物件的安全資訊。

trans-unit.source: It identifies the object's owner and primary group.
trans-unit.target: 它可識別物件的擁有人和主要群組。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Execute" /> is currently defined to equal <see langword="ReadSecurity" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Execute" /> 目前定義為等於 <see langword="ReadSecurity" />。

trans-unit.source: The right to change the owner in the object's security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 變更物件安全性描述元中所有人的權限。

trans-unit.source: No access.
trans-unit.target: 沒有存取權。

trans-unit.source: The right to read the information in the object's security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 讀取物件安全性描述元中資訊的權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Read" /> is currently defined to equal <see langword="ReadSecurity" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Read" /> 目前定義為等於 <see langword="ReadSecurity" />。

trans-unit.source: The right to read the information in the object's security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 讀取物件安全性描述元中資訊的權限。

trans-unit.source: Combines <see langword="Delete" />, <see langword="ReadSecurity" />, <see langword="WriteSecurity" />, and <see langword="ModifyOwner" /> access.
trans-unit.target: 結合 <see langword="Delete" />、<see langword="ReadSecurity" />、<see langword="WriteSecurity" /> 和 <see langword="ModifyOwner" /> 存取權。

trans-unit.source: The right to use the object for synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 使用同步物件的權限。

trans-unit.source: This enables a thread to wait until the object is in a specific state.
trans-unit.target: 如此可使執行緒等待特定狀態下的物件。

trans-unit.source: The right to read the information in the object's security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 讀取物件安全性描述元中資訊的權限。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Write" /> is currently defined to equal <see langword="ReadSecurity" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Write" /> 目前定義為等於 <see langword="ReadSecurity" />。

trans-unit.source: The right to modify the discretionary access control list (DACL) in the security descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 修改安全性描述元中 Discretionary 存取控制清單 (Discretionary Access Control List，DACL) 的權限。

trans-unit.source: The DACL controls access to the object.
trans-unit.target: DACL 控制物件的存取權。

trans-unit.source: Being able to write to the DACL gives the user the ability to set security for the object.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入至 DACL 讓使用者設定物件的安全性。
